explains: adj. 成果丰硕的，富有成效的；富饶的，多产的；（人）多子多孙的

sentences.en: We had a long, happy, fruitful relationship.
sentences.cn: 我们曾有一段长久、愉快而富有成效的关系。

sentences.en: Their efforts have been proven fruitful.
sentences.cn: 事实证明他们的努力是有成效的。

sentences.en: The work will be more fruitful under this plan.
sentences.cn: 按照这一方案，做这工作将更有成效。
